item.description:
The Museum of Printing in North Andover is holding a free fair. There'll be printing and book arts demonstrations, vendors, and more. Check the Museum of Printing for more info.

I've added the Museum's flyer in the File section (hold down "More" in the menu bar above) which explains what to expect.

A few of us are meeting for brunch at Panera Bread in North Andover at 10:15 AM and then heading over to the museum. Others can meet us later. I don't know the museum's layout, but I know there is a store. So if we haven't met up with you by 11:30 AM head to the museum store to meet up.

Hope to see you at the fair!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Printing Arts Fair - North Andover - UPDATED
